foreignData.name: Laccolith-Welpe
foreignData.text: Immer wenn der Laccolith-Welpe geblockt wird, kannst Du ihn einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl Schaden in Höhe seiner Stärke zufügen lassen. Wenn du dies tust, fügt der Laccolith-Welpe in diesem Zug keinen Kampfschaden zu.

mainBoard.name: Laccolith Whelp
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever Laccolith Whelp becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Whelp deals no combat damage this turn.

rulings.text: It can target any creature on the battlefield, not just one of the ones blocking it.
The ability allows you to deal damage during the declare blockers step of combat, which is well before even first strike creatures deal damage.
The ability is optional. You can decide to allow it to deal combat damage as normal.
The ability triggers even if a spell or ability makes it blocked, instead of being blocked by a creature.

mainBoard.text: Whenever Laccolith Whelp becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Whelp assigns no combat damage this turn.

mainBoard.name: Reckless Abandon
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to play Reckless Abandon, sacrifice a creature.
Reckless Abandon deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

rulings.text: Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.
You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Reckless Abandon deals 4 damage to any target.

foreignData.name: Heilmittel
foreignData.text: Verhindere die nächsten 5 Schadenspunkte, aufgeteilt auf eine beliebige Anzahl Spieler und/oder Kreaturen Deiner Wahl, in diesem Zug.

mainBoard.name: Remedy
mainBoard.originalText: Prevent the next 5 damage this turn divided any way you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

rulings.text: If multiple replacement effects apply to a player or permanent being dealt damage, that player or the controller of that permanent chooses the order to apply them, not the controller of the source of damage.
If multiple sources would deal damage to an affected target at once, that target or that target’s controller chooses which source’s damage to prevent for each “shield.”
If some of the targets become illegal, the original division of prevention effects still applies, but the effects that would have been created for illegal targets aren’t created at all.

You divide the prevention effects as you cast Remedy, not as it resolves. Each target must be assigned at least 1 prevention “shield.” You can’t choose more than five targets and assign none to a target.

mainBoard.text: Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose.

mainBoard.flavorText: Rainclouds don't last long in Shiv, but that doesn't stop the lightning.

foreignData.name: Lichtbogen
foreignData.text: Der Lichtbogen fügt 3 Schadenspunkte zu, die Du beliebig auf Kreaturen und/oder Spieler Deiner Wahl verteilen kannst.

mainBoard.name: Arc Lightning
mainBoard.originalText: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

rulings.text: If some of the creatures are illegal targets as Arc Lightning tries to resolve, the original division of damage still applies but no damage is dealt to the illegal targets. If all targets are illegal, Arc Lightning doesn’t resolve.
You choose how many targets Arc Lightning has and how the damage is divided as you cast the spell. Each target must receive at least 1 damage.

mainBoard.text: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

mainBoard.name: Seal of Cleansing
mainBoard.originalText: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

rulings.text: Sacrificing Seal of Cleansing is the cost to activate its ability. Once you activate the ability, no player can do anything to Seal of Cleansing to stop you from activating it. Notably, if you cast Seal of Cleansing during your turn, you'll have priority to activate its ability before anyone can respond to stop you.
